subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Old Fashioned can rejoin the list of Kentucky Derby contenders with a strong showing in the Arkansas Derby on Saturday. Old Fashioned, trained by Larry Jones, was made the 9-5 favorite in the 10-horse field entered in the mile-and-an-eighth race.
snippet: Old Fashioned can rejoin the list of Kentucky Derby contenders with a strong showing in the Arkansas Derby on Saturday. Old Fashioned, trained by Larry Jones, was made the 9-5 favorite in the 10-horse field entered in the mile-and-an-eighth race.
